1#include "NodeGeometry.hpp"
2
3#include "Node.hpp"
4#include "NodeDataModel.hpp"
5#include "NodeGraphicsObject.hpp"
6#include "NodeState.hpp"
7#include "PortType.hpp"
8#include "StyleCollection.hpp"

10#include <cmath>
11#include <iostream>
12using QtNodes::Node;
13using QtNodes::NodeDataModel;
14using QtNodes::NodeGeometry;
15using QtNodes::PortIndex;
16using QtNodes::PortType;
17NodeGeometry::NodeGeometry(std::unique_ptr<NodeDataModel> const &dataModel)
18 : _width(100), _height(150), _inputPortWidth(70), _outputPortWidth(70), _entryHeight(20), _spacing(20), _hovered(false),
19 _nSources(dataModel->nPorts(PortType::Out)), _nSinks(dataModel->nPorts(PortType::In)), _draggingPos(-1000, -1000), _dataModel(dataModel),
20 _fontMetrics(QFont()), _boldFontMetrics(QFont())
21{
22 QFont f;
23 f.setBold(true);
24 _boldFontMetrics = QFontMetrics(f);
25}
26unsigned int NodeGeometry::nSources() const
27{
28 return _dataModel->nPorts(PortType::Out);
29}
30unsigned int NodeGeometry::nSinks() const
31{
32 return _dataModel->nPorts(PortType::In);
33}
34QRectF NodeGeometry::entryBoundingRect() const
35{
36 double const addon = 0.0;
37 return QRectF(0 - addon, 0 - addon, _entryWidth + 2 * addon, _entryHeight + 2 * addon);
38}
39QRectF NodeGeometry::boundingRect() const
40{
41 auto const &nodeStyle = StyleCollection::nodeStyle();
42 double hAddon = 1 * nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
43 double vAddon = 2 * nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
44 return QRectF(0 - vAddon, 0 - hAddon, _width + 2 * vAddon, _height + 2 * hAddon);
45}
46void NodeGeometry::recalculateSize() const
47{
48 _entryHeight = _fontMetrics.height();
49 {
50 unsigned int maxNumOfEntries = std::max(_nSinks, _nSources);
51 unsigned int step = _entryHeight + _spacing;
52 _height = step * maxNumOfEntries;
53 }
54 if (_dataModel->wembed())
55 if (auto w = _dataModel->embeddedWidget())
56 {
57 _height = std::max(_height, static_cast<unsigned>(w->height()));
58 }
59 _height += captionHeight();
60 _inputPortWidth = portWidth(PortType::In);
61 _outputPortWidth = portWidth(PortType::Out);
62 _width = _inputPortWidth + _outputPortWidth + 2 * _spacing;
63 if (_dataModel->wembed())
64 if (auto w = _dataModel->embeddedWidget())
65 {
66 _width += w->width();
67 }
68 _width = std::max(_width, captionWidth());
69 if (_dataModel->validationState() != NodeValidationState::Valid)
70 {
71 _width = std::max(_width, validationWidth());
72 _height += validationHeight() + _spacing;
73 }
74}
75void NodeGeometry::recalculateSize(QFont const &font) const
76{
77 QFontMetrics fontMetrics(font);
78 QFont boldFont = font;
79 boldFont.setBold(true);
80 QFontMetrics boldFontMetrics(boldFont);
81 if (_boldFontMetrics != boldFontMetrics)
82 {
83 _fontMetrics = fontMetrics;
84 _boldFontMetrics = boldFontMetrics;
85 recalculateSize();
86 }
87}
88QSize NodeGeometry::minimumEmbeddedSize() const
89{
90 const unsigned int maxNumOfEntries = std::max(_nSinks, _nSources);
91 const unsigned int step = _fontMetrics.height() + _spacing;
92 unsigned int height = step * maxNumOfEntries;
93 unsigned int width = 0;
94 if (auto w = _dataModel->embeddedWidget())
95 {
96 height = std::max(height, static_cast<unsigned>(w->minimumHeight()));
97 width = std::max(width, static_cast<unsigned>(w->minimumHeight()));
98 }
99 width = std::max(width, captionWidth());
100 if (_dataModel->validationState() != NodeValidationState::Valid)
101 width = std::max(width, validationWidth());
102 return QSize(width, height);
103}
104QSize NodeGeometry::maximumEmbeddedSize() const
105{
106 if (auto w = _dataModel->embeddedWidget())
107 return w->maximumSize();
108 return QSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
109}
110QPointF NodeGeometry::portScenePosition(PortIndex index, PortType portType, QTransform const &t) const
111{
112 auto const &nodeStyle = StyleCollection::nodeStyle();
113 unsigned int step = _entryHeight + _spacing;
114 QPointF result;
115 double totalHeight = 0.0;
116 totalHeight += captionHeight();
117 totalHeight += step * index;
118 // TODO: why?
119 totalHeight += step / 2.0;
120 switch (portType)
121 {
122 case PortType::Out:
123 {
124 double x = _width + nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
125 result = QPointF(x, totalHeight);
126 break;
127 }
128 case PortType::In:
129 {
130 double x = 0.0 - nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
131 result = QPointF(x, totalHeight);
132 break;
133 }
134 default: break;
135 }
136 return t.map(result);
137}
138PortIndex NodeGeometry::checkHitScenePoint(PortType portType, QPointF const scenePoint, QTransform const &sceneTransform) const
139{
140 auto const &nodeStyle = StyleCollection::nodeStyle();
141 PortIndex result = INVALID;
142 if (portType == PortType::None)
143 return result;
144 double const tolerance = 2.0 * nodeStyle.ConnectionPointDiameter;
145 unsigned int const nItems = _dataModel->nPorts(portType);
146 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nItems; ++i)
147 {
148 auto pp = portScenePosition(i, portType, sceneTransform);
149 QPointF p = pp - scenePoint;
150 auto distance = std::sqrt(QPointF::dotProduct(p, p));
151 if (distance < tolerance)
152 {
153 result = PortIndex(i);
154 break;
155 }
156 }
157 return result;
158}
159QRect NodeGeometry::resizeRect() const
160{
161 unsigned int rectSize = 7;
162 return QRect(_width - rectSize, _height - rectSize, rectSize, rectSize);
163}
164QPointF NodeGeometry::widgetPosition() const
165{
166 if (auto w = _dataModel->embeddedWidget())
167 {
168 if (w->sizePolicy().verticalPolicy() & QSizePolicy::ExpandFlag)
169 {
170 // If the widget wants to use as much vertical space as possible, place it
171 // immediately after the caption.
172 return QPointF(_spacing + portWidth(PortType::In), captionHeight());
173 }
174 else
175 {
176 if (_dataModel->validationState() != NodeValidationState::Valid)
177 {
178 return QPointF(_spacing + portWidth(PortType::In),
179 (captionHeight() + _height - validationHeight() - _spacing - w->height()) / 2.0);
180 }
181 return QPointF(_spacing + portWidth(PortType::In), (captionHeight() + _height - w->height()) / 2.0);
182 }
183 }
184 return QPointF();
185}
186int NodeGeometry::equivalentWidgetHeight() const
187{
188 if (_dataModel->validationState() != NodeValidationState::Valid)
189 {
190 return height() - captionHeight() + validationHeight();
191 }
192 return height() - captionHeight();
193}
194unsigned int NodeGeometry::captionHeight() const
195{
196 if (!_dataModel->captionVisible())
197 return 0;
198 QString name = _dataModel->caption();
199 return _boldFontMetrics.boundingRect(name).height();
200}
201unsigned int NodeGeometry::captionWidth() const
202{
203 if (!_dataModel->captionVisible())
204 return 0;
205 QString name = _dataModel->caption();
206 return _boldFontMetrics.boundingRect(name).width();
207}
208unsigned int NodeGeometry::validationHeight() const
209{
210 QString msg = _dataModel->validationMessage();
211 return _boldFontMetrics.boundingRect(msg).height();
212}
213unsigned int NodeGeometry::validationWidth() const
214{
215 QString msg = _dataModel->validationMessage();
216 return _boldFontMetrics.boundingRect(msg).width();
217}
218QPointF NodeGeometry::calculateNodePositionBetweenNodePorts(PortIndex targetPortIndex, PortType targetPort, Node *targetNode,
219 PortIndex sourcePortIndex, PortType sourcePort, Node *sourceNode, Node &newNode)
220{
221 // Calculating the nodes position in the scene. It'll be positioned half way
222 // between the two ports that it "connects". The first line calculates the
223 // halfway point between the ports (node position + port position on the node
224 // for both nodes averaged). The second line offsets this coordinate with the
225 // size of the new node, so that the new nodes center falls on the originally
226 // calculated coordinate, instead of it's upper left corner.
227 auto converterNodePos =
228 (sourceNode->nodeGraphicsObject().pos() + sourceNode->nodeGeometry().portScenePosition(sourcePortIndex, sourcePort) +
229 targetNode->nodeGraphicsObject().pos() + targetNode->nodeGeometry().portScenePosition(targetPortIndex, targetPort)) /
230 2.0f;
231 converterNodePos.setX(converterNodePos.x() - newNode.nodeGeometry().width() / 2.0f);
232 converterNodePos.setY(converterNodePos.y() - newNode.nodeGeometry().height() / 2.0f);
233 return converterNodePos;
234}
235unsigned int NodeGeometry::portWidth(PortType portType) const
236{
237 unsigned width = 0;
238 for (auto i = 0ul; i < _dataModel->nPorts(portType); ++i)
239 {
240 QString name;
241 if (_dataModel->portCaptionVisible(portType, i))
242 {
243 name = _dataModel->portCaption(portType, i);
244 }
245 else
246 {
247 name = _dataModel->dataType(portType, i)->name();
248 }
249#if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 10, 0)
250 width = std::max(unsigned(_fontMetrics.horizontalAdvance(name)), width);
251#else
252 width = std::max(unsigned(_fontMetrics.width(name)), width);
253#endif
254 }
255 return width;
256}
